00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 
00029 #include <QTimer>
00030 #include <QQueue>
00031 
00032 class KviChannel;
00033 
00034 class KVIRC_API KviRequestQueue: public QObject
00035 {
00036         Q_OBJECT
00037 protected:
00038         QQueue<KviChannel *> channels;
00039         QTimer timer;
00040         // MODE %s b MUST BE THE LAST AUTOMATIC CHANNEL QUERY
00041         // so we get RPL_ENDOFBANLIST as the last reply
00042         // and we know that the channel is in sync
00043         enum requestTypes {
00044                 ModeRequest = 0,
00045                 BanERequest = 1,
00046                 InviRequest = 2,
00047                 WhoRequest = 3,
00048                 BanRequest = 4
00049         };
00050         requestTypes curType;
00051 public:
00052         KviRequestQueue();
00053         virtual ~KviRequestQueue();
00054 public:
00055         void enqueueChannel(KviChannel *pChan);
00056         void dequeueChannel(KviChannel *pChan);
00057         void clearAll();
00058 private slots:
00059         void timerSlot();
00060 };
00061 
00062 #endif
